height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Political Events” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Whenever there is election time, there are tonnes of duties and responsibilities that any leader needs to fulfill, and that too in minimal time constraints. During Election, lack of complete information, time, and technically skilled workforce can lead to great destruction, and it also leads to incomplete results in the end. Political Events include a significant amount of office work, Rallies, public meetings, different field activities, and promotions of leader,s policies.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602928447178{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/beautiful-white-lovely-background-with-papercut-style_112769-295.jpg?id=7825) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events ?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”14px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

The management of Archi Events has a lot of exposure and experience in managing different political events ranging from ground level to premium segment. Archi Event briefly discusses the requirement with the candidate followed by a full proof structured planning. It ensures the privacy and secrecy of the services offered to the candidate. Along with a highly trusted and specialized workforce, Archi Events fulfills the political event responsibility with personal supervision and zero error theory. 

Under Political Events, The service is available ranging from the Nagar Nigam election, Vidhansabha Elections, and Lok Sabha Election to various social institutions Elections. 

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8294″ img_size=”500*300″ alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602928482971{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/abstract-white-triangle-shapes-background_1035-17544.jpg?id=8298) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][vc_single_image image=”8291″ img_size=”1500*1000″ alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border” border_color=”black”][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services We Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text]

  • I.T. Services
  • Media Management
  • Audio & Video Production
  • Creative Writing
  • General Management
  • Public Meetings & Rally Management
  • Outdoor Publicity Management
  • Publicity Material Management
  • Security & Surveillance Arrangements
  • And Many More Services………….

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
